definitions.definition: A set of spiritual practices and traditions created and concealed from slave-owners by enslaved Africans in North America, based on traditional African beliefs.
Supernatural bad luck, or something or someone believed to bring bad luck .
A tall thin spire of rock that protrudes from the bottom of arid basins and badlands .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A set of spiritual practices and traditions created and concealed from slave-owners by enslaved Africans in North America, based on traditional African beliefs.
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly US ) A practitioner of voodoo .
( chiefly US ) Supernatural bad luck, or something or someone believed to bring bad luck .
( geology ) A tall thin spire of rock that protrudes from the bottom of arid basins and badlands .
